short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add helpful indicators to Google Search results to help find quality websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Helpful indicators in Google Search results for:

- Limited to a few articles per day
- Hard paywall
- SEO generated spam
- Slow site
- Frequent clickbait
- Obtrusive ads
- Poor or non-existent privacy policy
- Poor accessibility
- Poor UX
- Forced signup

Dodge paywalls and skip those click-hungry sites with ease! This browser extension warns you upfront, so you can enjoy uninterrupted reading. Say goodbye to surprises and keep your clicks for the best content out there!

For any issues or comments: blissfulbrowser@proton.me

The following are currently unimplemented but very much a priority. Please check back soon!
** DuckDuckGo, SearX, Bing, Yahoo, Startpage, Brave Search
If you would like support for a search engine and just can't wait, feel free to poke me at: blissfulbrowser@proton.me

Firefox extension will be available soon as well.
